title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.4 - Declaration of overweight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4033.4 - Declaration of overweight

State Regulations

If a jockey intends to carry overweight, such jockey
must declare the amount thereof at the time of weighing out, or if in doubt as
to his or her proper weight, such jockey may declare the weight he or she
intends to carry. Notes

4033.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
